As an immediate action when an enemy within 30 feet threatens a critical hit, the shaman can force the creature to reroll its original attack roll with a penalty equal to the shamanâ€™s Charisma modifier. The target can attempt a Will save to negate this ability.

Whether or not the save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours. This is a curse effect.
